titleStmt.title: Apospasmatia sacra, or, A collection of posthumous and orphan lectures delivered at St. Pauls and St. Giles his church / by the Right Honourable and Reverend Father in God, Lancelot Andrews ...
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne for H. Moseley, A. Crooke, D. Pakeman, L. Fawne, R. Royston, and N. Ekins,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
